name: Dissonance (itch) (Taneim, spearmintorbit, ec3938, Sabahat-Sami)
description:
By: Taneim, Sami, Semi, Evie

Currently, we have given a build of the beta, but this is incredibly unfinished and unpolished (missing some of the major pieces like sound and boss fights). But what we do have are the main mechanics of the player completed and some of the level design.  There are also a couple of bugs. There is also no end scene. Also, the camera will be modified later.

please don't be mean for the current build, thanks.
